description:
Are you hungry? Do you want some yakiniku?
Let's play this game! Simple and easy!
Simulate to eating a yakiniku with no more calories!!!
Just chill out and simulate eating yakiniku!

HOW TO PLAY

1. keep raw meat on the stove.
2. Flip meat when you think it's OK.
3. Beware it's OVERCOOK!
4. Throw away burned meat.
5. Keep perfect meat to sauce and eat it!

Enjoy your meal!!!!!!!
name: Yakiniku Simulator
